name: $source
desc: Returns: An absolute URI that identifies the Code System (if the source is a value set that crosses more than one code system).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An absolute URI that identifies the Code System (if the source is a value set that crosses more than one code system).

name: $sourceVersion
desc: Returns: The specific version of the code system, as determined by the code system authority.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The specific version of the code system, as determined by the code system authority.

name: $target
desc: Returns: An absolute URI that identifies the code system of the target code (if the target is a value set that cross code systems).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An absolute URI that identifies the code system of the target code (if the target is a value set that cross code systems).

name: $targetVersion
desc: Returns: The specific version of the code system, as determined by the code system authority.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The specific version of the code system, as determined by the code system authority.

name: $element
desc: Returns: Mappings for an individual concept in the source to one or more concepts in the target.

name: $addelement
desc: Mappings for an individual concept in the source to one or more concepts in the target.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Mappings for an individual concept in the source to one or more concepts in the target.

name: $unmapped
desc: Returns: What to do when there is no match in the mappings in the group.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: What to do when there is no match in the mappings in the group.
